vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#366-373) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#368)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#379-382) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#381)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.totalSupply (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#67) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.balanceOf (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#68) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.transfer (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#69) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function allowance(address _ocwner, address _spender) public view returns (uint256);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.allowance (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#70) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.approve (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#71) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.transferFrom (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#72) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (IncreasingPriceCrowdsale.sol#379-382) should be declared external
